heroTitle: Make Data-Driven Decisions, Increase Your Profitability
heroSubtitle: Finops AI brings all your financial and operational data together. It provides the insights you need to increase your efficiency and gain a competitive advantage.
solutionsTitle: One Platform for All Your Financial Needs
solutionsSubtitle: From data analysis to budget planning, all the tools you need to manage the financial health of your business.
integrationsTitle: Integrate All Your Data Sources in Minutes
integrationsSubtitle: Easily connect to cloud services, databases, spreadsheets, and CRM systems to get a holistic view of your business.
dashboardPreviewSubtitle: Visualize your data with our drag-and-drop interface. Gain deep insights with a variety of chart types, tables, and maps.
sectorCardsSubtitle: We offer customized solutions for different sectors. Find the best tools to meet your business needs.
footerStayUpdatedSubtitle: The latest news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.

valueProp.content: "Wherever your financial data is (ERP, Excel, Cloud), we transform it into <1>understandable and actionable insights</1>, increasing your profitability and efficiency."
